TextLibrary.Text: PEZT
Pezt thanks you.
Pezt thanks you.
You're welcome. Now about that battle...
You're welcome. Now about that battle...
Pezt find many Trident bodies. Pezt take their stuff. Pezt also see Trident ship fly away through LeapGate.
Pezt find many Trident bodies. Pezt take their stuff. Pezt also see Trident ship fly away through LeapGate.
Really... they got through a LeapGate?
Really... they got through a LeapGate?
Yes. Pezt thinks they are very clever. Know how to use LeapGates.
Yes. Pezt thinks they are very clever. Know how to use LeapGates.
Which LeapGate?
Which LeapGate?
Pezt will come aboard and show you.
Pezt will come aboard and show you.
Don't let it on board!
Don't let it on board!
Why not?
Why not?
Trust me, kid, these things are bad news.
Trust me, kid, these things are bad news.
Can't you just tell me which LeapGate?
Can't you just tell me which LeapGate?
Pezt prefers to show you. Pezt ship not really work any longer. If you abandon Pezt now, more Pirates will hunt Pezt. Pirates will shoot Pezt. Pezt death will be on your head.
Pezt prefers to show you. Pezt ship not really work any longer. If you abandon Pezt now, more Pirates will hunt Pezt. Pirates will shoot Pezt. Pezt death will be on your head.
Oh, very well then. Come aboard.
Oh, very well then. Come aboard.
